tool_description: Generate an antibody structure prediction from an Fv sequence (heavy chain and light chain).

required_parameters.name: heavy_chain_sequence
required_parameters.description: The amino acid sequence of the antibody's heavy chain.

required_parameters.name: light_chain_sequence
required_parameters.description: The amino acid sequence of the antibody's light chain.

optional_parameters.name: decoys
optional_parameters.description: Number of decoys to create. The lowest energy decoy will be selected as final predicted structure.

optional_parameters.name: renumber
optional_parameters.description: Convert final predicted structure to Chothia format using AbNum. This allows for easier comparison of antibody structures and more accurate identification of key functional regions.

return_values.name: antibody_structure
return_values.description: The designed 3D structure of the antibody saved as a PDB file.
